name: Fifth Ring
description:
We are a global integrated corporate communications company with a strong track record in energy communications. 
Providing cohesive, consistent marketing communications we integrate our five key disciplines: brand and strategy, design, digital media, public relations and advertising into one seamless offer across the main energy hubs of the world: North America, South America, Europe, Middle East and Asia Pacific.

locations.address: Av. das Américas 500 bloco 23 sala 211 Barra da Tijuca
Suite 702 The Fairmont Dubai Sheikh Zayed Road
